message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $20000. Is this something you'd be interested in?
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer! I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. Would you be willing to consider this price?

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer! I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $18000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit on this sale. Would you be willing to consider this price?
Hi Alice, thank you for the counteroffer. I'm still a bit above my budget, so I was thinking more along the lines of $14000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?

Hi Bob, I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, but I need to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you at $16000, but I don't think I can go any lower than that. Would you be willing to consider this price?
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to compromise and meet you at $15500. Would you be willing to consider this price?
